name: bbregister
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Performs within-subject, cross-modal registration using a boundary-based cost function.

inputs.name: Subject
inputs.description: FreeSurfer subject name as found in $SUBJECTS_DIR.

inputs.name: Moveable Volume
inputs.description: "Moveable" volume template for cross-modal volume. E.g., fMRI volume used for motion correction.

inputs.name: Registration File
inputs.description: Output FreeSurfer registration file (tkregister-style or LTA format).

inputs.name: T1 Contrast
inputs.description: Assume T1 contrast, White Matter brighter than Grey Matter.

inputs.name: T2/BOLD/DTI Contrast
inputs.description: Assume T2 contrast, Grey Matter brighter than White Matter. Same as --bold and --dti.

inputs.name: Voxel Shift Map
inputs.description: Include B0 distortion correction. A voxel shift map can be created with the epidewarp.fsl script.

inputs.name: No Coreg Ref Mask
inputs.description: Do not use aparc+aseg.mgz as a reference mask.

inputs.name: Initialize Header
inputs.description: Use geometry info for close voxel-to-voxel registration. Typically valid if acquired in same session.

inputs.name: Initial Reg File
inputs.description: Supply an initial registration matrix; can be LTA format.

inputs.name: Intermediate Volume
inputs.description: Volume used as an intermediate during registration. Useful for partial field-of-view volumes.

inputs.name: Middle Frame Registration
inputs.description: Register to middle frame (not with --frame option).

inputs.name: Output Volume
inputs.description: Resample moveable volume and save as specified output volume.

inputs.name: Subject from Reg
inputs.description: Get subject name from registration file.

output-files.name: Registration Output
output-files.description: Output registration file in dat or lta format.
